title: Painkiller Hell and Damnation MULTi11-ADDONiA
description:
Painkiller: Hell and Damnation (C) Nordic Games

i N F O

Release Date..: 2014-05-06           Release Size..: 1xBluRay
Genre/Type....: Action/Shooter       Price.........: 45 Euro
Protection....: Steam                Languages.....: En/Fr/De/It/Es/Pt/Cz/Pl/Hu/Ru/Jp
Version.......: 20131211_3701        Systems.......: Win
Url...........: http://store.steampowered.com/app/252570/

n O T E S

Evil has returned! Demonic powers are manifesting themselves as a myriad
of dark creatures, fighting over the fates of imprisoned souls caught in
Purgatory.

Once again, it is up to Daniel Garner, in the unenviable position of being
the Curse of Darkness and the Toy of Light, to fight his way past hordes
of demons and fiends.

Questions remain... 'Can he stop the powerful creatures that stand in his
way? Will he ever leave the hell of Purgatory and be reunited with his wife
Catherine?'

Painkiller Hell & Damnation is a fast-paced, thrilling modern remake of an
all-action shooter Classic!

Notes:

Game is updated to the latest version: build 20131211_3701

Release includes Digital Extras and the following DLC:

* Painkiller Hell & Damnation - Full Metal Rocket
* Painkiller Hell & Damnation - Heavens Above
* Painkiller Hell & Damnation - City Critters
* Painkiller Hell & Damnation - Medieval Horror
* Painkiller Hell & Damnation - Operation Zombie Bunker
* Painkiller Hell & Damnation - The Clock Strikes Meat Night
* Painkiller Hell & Damnation Collector's Edition DLC 1
* Painkiller Hell & Damnation Collector's Edition DLC 2
* Painkiller Hell & Damnation: Demonic Vacation at the Blood Sea
* Painkiller Hell & Damnation: Halloween DLC

Change language to the desired one in steam_api.ini:

Language=%value% , where %value% could be the following:

english, german, french, italian, spanish, portuguese,
polish, czech, hungarian, russian, japanese

Special thanks flying to CODEX for supplying the crack.
